education_text.0: David Luckham is an emeritus professor of      Electrical engineering electrical engineering at      Stanford University Stanford UniversityDavid Luckham is an emeritus professor of      Electrical engineering electrical engineering at      Stanford University Stanford UniversityHe is best known as the originator of      Complex event processing complex event processing (CEP) as proposed in his 2002 book The Power of EventsLuckham has held faculty and invited faculty positions in both mathematics and computer science at eight major universities in Europe and the United States
